snippet: The automaker’s announcement that it would halt the manufacture of cars and engines in the country by the end of 2017 follows pullout plans from G.M. and Ford last year.
lead_paragraph: The automaker’s announcement that it would halt the manufacture of cars and engines in the country by the end of 2017 follows pullout plans from G.M. and Ford last year.

headline.main: Toyota to Stop Making Cars in Australia
